attributes.action: Assist British culture integration by changing identity's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many of us fill out forms and have to state our religious/cultural identity's.
Instead of us being known as British white/indian/muslim etc why not be known as British English/Scottish/Welsh or N Irish only, regardless of colour or creed.  People can still have their own culture identity's but will not feel so segregated.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
